_header: Hail lovely Lady leman so light
Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: ‘Salue sancta parens’ — seven 8-line stanzas with this refrain

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Hayle lovely lady laymand so lyghtHayle myghtyfull modyr &
                    maydyn myld…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Þat we may syng & Ioy to theWith Salue sancta
                        parensExplicit
